Posts.Content: Hey, I’ve been diagnosed with IBC back in January, I know we all turn into google but statistics are out of date and our prognosis are better and increasing every day   The line of treatment for ibc would be chemo first, non skin sparing modiefied mastectomy and lymph node clearance followed by radiotherapy.
Posts.Title: What is the prognosis for inflammatory breast cancer

Posts.Content: I was 25 at my diagnosis, started my treatment 2 weeks after. It is aggressive type and your team should be on top of it! Thankfully, mine diagnosed me correctly from beginning and so far I follow recommended treatment path for it so all good.  Sadly, ibc cannot be diagnosed earlier that stage 3b so it’s normally in your lymph nodes too that’s my stage at the moment too. I still have two more chemos to go, saw the surgeon this week and operation is booked 4 weeks after.  Once you will see your oncologist write some questions down and bring someone with you! It is going to be ok just breathe!
Posts.Title: What is the prognosis for inflammatory breast cancer

Posts.Content: Also with ibc you can’t have reconstruction straight away it’s normally delayed at least a year due to not delaying radiotherapy also high re accurance chances x

Posts.Content: I’m sorry to hear this, I was really hoping it will be something simple, please do not good anything about IBC as is very out of date!  what is your receptors status? Hormones (er), protein her2 or triple negative? Make sure they start chemo as soon as possible as it’s crucial to move fast now! Is it in your lymph nodes too?
